heading.heading: ROLL-A-BINGO
heading.desc: ROLL-A-BINGO is a modern take on the classic family game BINGO. Players use their skills to roll a ball into the bingo squares while competing with other players to see who will roll the first BINGO! It is an entertaining game that encourages competition and offers amusement for all ages. Come in and enjoy a lively environment with upbeat tunes, daily giveaways, and fun prizes! Exclusive of kind items will be awarded to all BINGO winners!

birthday.heading: Birthday Parties & Events
birthday.desc: Celebrate your next birthday party, holiday party, corporate social, or special event at ROLL-A-BINGO! We offer a private party room that includes decorations, balloons, linens and a your own personal host.

gift.heading: Promotions & Gift Cards
gift.desc: Stay tuned for daily and weekly promotions at ROLL-A-BINGO! Join our VIP Rewards program and earn credits every time you play. Credits can be redeemed for prizes, free games and much more!
